item.title: My First Post
item.description: My name is Salma Dessouki and I am enjoying Lisbon. The data science course is interesting thus far but I was familiar with most of the code so it’s been good. Lisbon weather is really nice especially coming from Toronto which is really cold. Anyways, I hope you enjoy scrolling through my blog!
